meanings.definition: To dye again with a red color.
meanings.sent1: She redyed her favorite shirt to make it brighter.
meanings.sent2: The fabric faded, so she redyed it to restore the vibrant red.
meanings.sent3: After accidentally turning her white dress pink, she redyed it red.
meanings.sent4: The artist redyed the canvas multiple times until the perfect shade was achieved.
meanings.sent5: The redyed roses stood out among the other flowers in the garden.

meanings.definition: Having been dyed again with a red color.
meanings.sent1: The redyed scarf matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The redyed hair looked fresh and vibrant.
meanings.sent3: He proudly wore his redyed jacket to the party.
meanings.sent4: The redyed curtains added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent5: The redyed fabric felt soft and luxurious.
